narrative.title: Provider Overview
narrative.text: Soraya Sawicki is a Social Worker provider based in Avon, CT. From 2018-01 through 2019-01, this provider received $180K in Medicaid payments across 2K claims serving 380 beneficiaries, billing 1 distinct procedure codes.

narrative.title: Key Findings
items: 100% of billing is concentrated in 90837 (90837), indicating significant specialization in this service.
Billing stopped in 2019-01, suggesting this provider is no longer active in Medicaid. Abrupt cessation of billing can be a risk indicator.
